main.subtitle: We offer a wide range of solutions for your business.
main.description: We offer a wide range of solutions for your business. From web development to graphic design, from SEO to social media marketing. We make sure your business is ready for the future.

services.title: What can we do for you?

portfolio.title: A look through our portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Navigate through a selection of projects we've worked on in the past.

web.title: Web Development & Design
web.subtitle: Websites with an eye for detail
web.description: Your online presence is extremely important in 2023. We design websites that are not just attractive, but that also perform flawlessly. From simple websites to complex web shops.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: We make sure your website loads as fast as possible. This is not only important for the user experience, but also for your SEO.

responsive.title: Responsive
responsive.description: Your website will be designed to look great on any device, from desktop to mobile, from tablet to smartwatch.

secure.title: Secure
secure.description: Security is extremely important in 2023. We make sure your website is protected against hackers and other malicious attacks.

accessible.title: Accessible
accessible.description: Everyone should be able to use your website. We make sure your website is accessible for everyone, including people with disabilities.

uxui.title: UX/UI Design
uxui.description: A sleek, modern design is important for your website. We make sure your website is designed to be user-friendly and easy to navigate.

seo.title: SEO
seo.description: Through advanced SEO-methods, we make sure your website is easily findable on the internet.

tech.title: Cutting Edge Tech
tech.description: Our websites are built using the latest and most advanced technologies. This ensures that your website is future-proof and will always be up-to-date.

support.title: Thorough Support
support.description: We're here to help you. We provide thorough support for your website, from hosting to maintenance, from updates to security.

webdev.title: Web Ontwikkeling
webdev.description: We design and develop websites that are not just attractive, but that also perform flawlessly. From simple websites to complex web shops.

webdesign.title: Web Design
webdesign.description: Our designs are not just attractive, but also user-friendly and easy to navigate. We make sure your website is designed to be accessible for everyone, including people with disabilities.

webhosting.title: Web Hosting
webhosting.description: We make sure your website is always online, and that you always get the support you need.

websecurity.title: Web Security
websecurity.description: Your website will be protected against hackers and other malicious attacks.

webseo.title: Web SEO
webseo.description: Mist Media makes sure your website is easily findable on the internet through advanced SEO-methods.

webaccessibility.title: Web Accessibility
webaccessibility.description: Everyone should be able to use your website. We make sure your website is accessible for everyone, including people with disabilities.

emailhosting.title: E-mail Hosting
emailhosting.description: We can provide you with a professional e-mail address, which is linked to your domain name and includes safety measures and a personal signature.

platforms.title: Platforms
platforms.description: We develop every kind of web app. From simple websites to complex web shops and apps, from blogs to social media platforms.

design.title: Graphic Design & Branding
design.subtitle: A powerful brand
design.description: We design graphics that make your brand stand out from the rest. From logos to flyers, from business cards to advertisements. Through a professional, universal corporate design, we ensure that your business acquires a recognisable identity.

allinone.title: All-in-one
allinone.description: At Mist Media, you get the full package. We design your logo, your website, your business cards, your flyers, ... We make sure your brand is consistent and recognisable, both online and offline. We even deliver your printed matter at your doorstep.

concepts.title: Multiple Concepts
concepts.description: We provide you with multiple concepts, so you can choose the one that suits your business best.

personal.title: Personal Approach
personal.description: Your brand is unique, and so are you. We make sure your brand is designed to fit your business perfectly.

branding.title: Branding
branding.description: Your branding is what sets you apart from the rest. We make sure your brand is consistent and recognisable, on the web and in print.

printed.title: Printer Matter
printed.description:
Flyers, posters, cards, ...
We design it all.

editorial.title: Editorial Design
editorial.description: Magazines? Books? Newspapers? Your publication will be designed to look great and to be easy to read.

social.title: Social Media Marketing
social.subtitle: Online presence
social.description: We make your online presence get the boost it needs. Through social media marketing, we ensure that your company achieves great exposure on the internet.

analysis.title: Detailed Analysis
analysis.description: We provide you with detailed reports of your online presence, so you know exactly what is happening with your brand on the internet.

strongbrand.title: Broad Branding
strongbrand.description: Branding is not only a matter of graphics. It is equally, if not more important to have a strong and recognisable presence on the internet, and we make sure you do so.

results.title: Measurable Results
results.description: Measurability is one of the biggest advantages of online marketing. Our results are effective and measurable, so you know exactly what you're paying for.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: By integrating specific tools into your website and social media, we can analyse its performance and provide you with detailed reports, in order to optimise your online presence.

seo.title: Zoekmachine Optimalisatie
seo.description: With the help of advanced SEO-methods, we make sure your website is easily findable on any search engine.

ads.title: Ads & Campagnes
ads.description: We make sure your brand gets the exposure it needs on the internet, through ads and campaigns on social media and search engines.

smm.title: Social Media Marketing
smm.description: Mist Media understands the importance of social media. Together, we can create a strong and recognisable presence for your brand on the internet, and build a strong relationship with your customers.

av.title: Audio/Video Production
av.subtitle: Capturing your business
av.description: We make sure your business is captured in a professional way. These can be both photos and videos, which can also be integrated into your website and/or graphics.

personal.title: Personal Approach
personal.description: Mist Media makes sure your business is captured in a professional way, and that the result is exactly what you had in mind.

polyvalent.title: Polyvalent Productions
polyvalent.description: Events, products, branding, ... We take care of it all. You will have nothing to worry about, and can focus on what really matters: your business.

finish.title: Detailed Finish
finish.description: Your media will be optimised and edited to perfection, so that it may - quite literally - shine on your website and/or graphics.

photo.title: Photography
photo.description: Mist Media captures your event, product, or business in a professional way, so you can use the photos for your website, graphics, or social media.

video.title: Video
video.description: We create aftermovies, promotional videos, and more. We offer the full package, from recording to editing, and even subtitles and animations.

montage.title: Montage & Editing
montage.description: We edit & optimise your photos and videos, so you can instantly use them for your website, graphics, or social media.

vfx.title: Visual Effects
vfx.description: We create visual effects for your videos, so they look even more professional.

subtitle.title: Ondertiteling
subtitle.description: We provide subtitles for your videos, so they can be understood by everyone.

animation.title: Animation
animation.description: We create animations in 2D and 3D, so that your videos can be even more captivating.

3d.title: 3D Visualisation & Animation
3d.subtitle: Another dimension
3d.description: From small, didactic animations to printable 3D models. We make sure your products, prototypes and animations are displayed in a professional and natural way.

detail.title: Eye for Detail
detail.description: With our perfectionism and eye for detail, we make sure your products and prototypes are displayed in a professional and natural way.

realistic.title: Net Echt
realistic.description: Our animations don't contain any weird-looking movements or unnatural behaviour. We make sure your animations look as realistic as possible.

finish.title: Finished with Care
finish.description: We integrate your brand into your animations, so they are consistent with your corporate design. We also deliver your visualisations in multiple formats, so you can instantly integrate them into your website, graphics, or social media.

model.title: 3D Models
model.description: We create 3D models of your products, prototypes, or even your corporate branding.

animation.title: 3D Animations
animation.description: From short, simple animation to elaborate, complex projects. Your imagination is the limit.

printing.title: 3D Printing
printing.description: We can even print your 3D models, so you can admire them in real life and use them for your business.
